description: This schema represents the amount of calories burned in kilocalories (kcal).

references.description: The LOINC code represents Calories burned:Power = Energy/Time:Point in time:^Patient:Quantitative, that is, a Quantitative measure of Calories burned by a Patient at a Point in time

effective_time_frame.description: As a measure of a phenomenon that occurs over a period of time, calories burned should not be associated to a date time time frame. Hence, effective time frame is restricted to be a time interval.

anyOf.description: If the value needed is a standard unit of duration, select from the duration-unit-value value set.
